text_logic_form: The length of side $a$ is $8$ units.
The length of side $b$ is $15$ units.
The length of side $c$ is $17$ units.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The length of side $a$ is $8$ units.
The length of side $b$ is $15$ units.
The length of side $c$ is $17$ units.
diagram_logic_form: The length of line $AB$ is equal to the length of side $c$.
The length of line $CB$ is equal to the length of side $a$.
The length of line $CA$ is equal to the length of side $b$.
line_instances: There are lines $CA$, $CB$, and $AB$, forming a right triangle $ABC$.
